item.title: Lil Nas X - Old Town Road
Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Free Bird
item.description:
Free Bird by Lynyrd Skynyrd. For educational use. The lyrics video was created by YouTuber Anna Mintz and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKLJdmR6UGU, I just added the ukulele chords. Chords Used: G, D, Em, F, C (and Bb, but only during the bridge / guitar solo).
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Taron Egerton - I'm Still Standing
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Cm and C. Raised a whole step from the original (Bbm and Bb). This is an updated video, just for the intro slide and the description. Sadly, you cannot update a video with a new version on YouTube. I left a link to this video on the original video.
As performed by Taron Egerton in “Sing.” I had originally had Taron Egerton's name wrong, and a number of people wrote comments to complain about it.
My boys enjoyed Sing and frequently sing this song. I had started working on but moved on to other videos. Katie Denure (One Music School) posted a tutorial today (https://youtu.be/m_Xoe9g00oc), which inspired me to wrap up this video. I took away some of the fast Ab Bb C changes that occur at the end of some phrases...feel free to add them back in your own practice. This video offers some good Barre chord practice (partial and full) with Cm, Ab, and Bb.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Visit the sister ukulele channel to this channel, YouTube.com/ukestuff

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Glee Cast - Somebody That I Used To Know
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Somebody That I Used To Know - Gotye (feat. Kimbra)
Using the chords: Bb C Dm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D XU D XU (X=chuck)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of F, a whole step higher than the original version.
Chords Used: F, F7, Bb, Bbm6, C7, D7, G7, Bdim7, E7, A7, Bm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown . Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Memory from "Cats" - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: A, F-sharp minor, D, C-sharp minor, Bm, E, F#, B, F, Dm, Bb, Am, G, C, Em (Starts in the key of A, ends in the key of C).
Memory from the musical “Cats” by Andrew Lloyd Webber. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. I just added chords to the lyric video created by YouTuber Miyanoe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available.
